item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

case 8972: if (playerHasItem(13595)) { teleportToX = 2782; teleportToY = 2890; } else if (playerEquipment[playerShield] == 13595) teleportToX = 2782; teleportToY = 2890; break;

item.title: Checking shield for a specific item
item.dc:creator: @0.o 0.o
item.description:
@0.o wrote:

Alright, I am making a defender minigame, and I want it to were if you are wielding, or have in your invetory, a specific item, it teleports you.

case 8972:
if (playerHasItem(13595)) {
teleportToX = 2782;
teleportToY = 2890;
} else if (playershield.equalsIgnoreCase(“Bronze Defender”))
teleportToX = 2782;
teleportToY = 2890;
break;

So far thats what I got, but player shield isnt recognized, is there anyway to rewrite this so it will work?

Read full topic
